xwikidoc.author: XWiki.tmarathe
xwikidoc.title: How do I export a patient record as a PDF
xwikidoc.content:
Patient records (including the pedigree and growth charts) can be exported as PDF documents.
1. Go to the patient record you wish to export 1. Click on //More Actions// > //Export PDF//

property.answer:
Patient records (including the pedigree and growth charts) can be exported as PDF documents.
1. Go to the patient record you wish to export. 1. On the top right of the page, click on //More Actions// > //Export PDF//
